item.title: My skill area is almost done.. almost?

item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

yeah i have every skill in my skill area and i got em all working, the only skill that doesnt work yet is mining. and i just cant get it fixed

P.S. NO ROBINI IM NOT STEALING YOUR CODES.

i added the rocks in makeGlobalObject and the purple rocks (ID = 2111) are at my skills area, but when i click em, nothing happens… :S this is my case :

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("You gain some mining exp and some cash."); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

anyone knows whats wrong?
